snippet: Declines in advertising and subscriptions pushed revenue at the company’s news and information services division down 3 percent.
abstract: News Corp reports its quarterly earnings for period ending Oct 31, 2014, grew by 4 percent, to $2.15 billion from $2.07 billion, compared with same period year ago.
lead_paragraph: Declines in advertising and subscriptions pushed revenue at the company’s news and information services division down 3 percent.

headline.main: Publishing and Real Estate Services Push Revenue Up at News Corporation
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Sales Are Up 4%, but Newspaper Revenue Falls
